title: Toy Robot Cinematic Build #1
description: A timeline-based cinematic unboxing and self-assembly of the Toy Robot set in a creatively staged environment.
scene_description: A chrome box lies at the foot of a child’s bed, glowing faintly in the dark room.
camera_setup: overhead top-down locked camera

timeline.action: The Toy Robot box begins to glow and vibrate gently.
timeline.audio: Low rumble or pulsing hum

timeline.action: The box bursts open with particles or steam revealing floating core components.
timeline.audio: Sharp cinematic pop with rising whoosh

timeline.action: All parts of the Toy Robot fly into place, assembling mid-air in a choreographed motion.
timeline.audio: Clicks, swirls, and ambient tech tones

timeline.action: The fully assembled Toy Robot lands softly into the scene. Accent lights animate around it.
timeline.audio: Subtle swoosh and confirming tone

timeline.action: Camera holds as ambient details subtly fade in—like glowing edges, fog, or soft motion.
timeline.audio: Soft ending swell with environmental fadeout
